details.title: Map Viewer
details.description: Basic map viewer widget using the Google Maps API

preference.name: radiusPreference
preference.label: Mark shadow radius
preference.description: When you click in a mark you will see a circle with this radius

preference.name: centerPreference
preference.label: Initial Location
preference.description: Location or decimal coordinates where map will be centered on load (e.g. 'New York' or '52, 5'). Leave this setting empty if you don't want to center the map at init. Remember to change the initial zoom level if you provide an initial place.

preference.name: zoomPreference
preference.label: Zoom Level
preference.description: Zoom level when the map is centered. From 1 to 22, where '1' represents the furthest level and '22' the maximum zoom level.

preference.name: initialZoom
preference.label: Initial Zoom Level
preference.description: Initial zoom level. From 1 to 22, where '1' represents the furthest level and '22' the maximum zoom level.

outputendpoint.name: routeDescriptionOutput
outputendpoint.label: Route Description
outputendpoint.description: Route description step by step. It may be connected with Route Description widget.

outputendpoint.name: addressOutput
outputendpoint.label: Address
outputendpoint.description: Address of a Google Map marker.

outputendpoint.name: utmCoordOutput
outputendpoint.label: UTM Coordinates
outputendpoint.description: UTM X, Y coordinates that is displayed in the map.

outputendpoint.name: decimalCoordOutput
outputendpoint.label: Decimal Coordinates
outputendpoint.description: Decimal X, Y coordinates that is displayed in the map.

outputendpoint.name: poiOutput
outputendpoint.label: PoI selected
outputendpoint.description: A PoI has been selected on the map

outputendpoint.name: poiListOutput
outputendpoint.label: PoI visibility change
outputendpoint.description: Change PoI list inside the viewport

outputendpoint.name: boundsOutput
outputendpoint.label: Change Viewport
outputendpoint.description: Change bounds of the current viewport.

inputendpoint.name: addressInput
inputendpoint.label: Address
inputendpoint.description: Address to be displayed on the map.

inputendpoint.name: coordsInput
inputendpoint.label: Coordinates
inputendpoint.description: Google Map Marker will be show in this decimal coordinates.

inputendpoint.name: routeInput
inputendpoint.label: Route
inputendpoint.description: Google Maps route to be displayed on the map.

inputendpoint.name: routeStepInput
inputendpoint.label: Route Step
inputendpoint.description: Detailed Step of a route. It may be connected with Route Description widget.

inputendpoint.name: poiInput
inputendpoint.label: Insert/Update PoI
inputendpoint.description: Insert or update a Point of Interest.

inputendpoint.name: deletePoiInput
inputendpoint.label: Delete PoI
inputendpoint.description: Removes a point or more point of interests from the map.

inputendpoint.name: poiInputCenter
inputendpoint.label: Insert/Update Centered PoI
inputendpoint.description: Insert or update a PoI and change the viewport centering the map on it

inputendpoint.name: selectPoiInput
inputendpoint.label: Select PoI
inputendpoint.description: Select a PoI and change the viewport centering the map on it
